name: Tawah, The Canon Tower
description:
Tawah, The Canon Tower is an interactive narrative experience metagame. 

A tower from a tower defense game levels up and goes out on an adventure through different game genres.

This game was created for Create Jam fall 2019 with the theme: level up a game mechanic .

Credits:
Tobias  Harpøth Adamsen - Programmer and Idea
Morten Bach Jakobsen - Game Designer and Artist

Honorable Mentions:
Nikolaj Østerby Jensen - Technical Support
Elina Trier Birgisson - Emotional Support 
Daniel Rasmus Aalykke - Critic
